net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.graphics
Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Block, CharacterEvent, DirAnim, FourDir, GameScreen, GridLayer, Hero, Layer, Level, MapEvent, MapObject, ObjectLayer, TeleportEvent, TestScreen
public interface Renderable

All objects that are to be drawn to the screen must implement this. It just contains a basic render method... for now.

Method Summary
 void postProcessing(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager manager)
          Perform all other necessary post-processing when the renderable assets are loaded.
 void queueRequiredAssets(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager manager)
          Queues up all the assets required to render this object in the resource manager.
 void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
          Render yourself to the screen using OpenGL.
 

Method Detail

render

void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
Render yourself to the screen using OpenGL. Nothing needs to be passed here because OpenGL is one giant statemachine clusterfuck.

Parameters:
camera - The camera to render with, may or may not be used

queueRequiredAssets

void queueRequiredAssets(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager manager)
Queues up all the assets required to render this object in the resource manager. Does not actually load them.

postProcessing

void postProcessing(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager manager)
Perform all other necessary post-processing when the renderable assets are loaded. Called before the first render and after asset loading.
